data.title: Slack Music
data.subTitle: Listen to music with style
data.excerpt: Slack Music is a bot for slack which creates a playlist of songs shared in slack channel.

content.content: Slack Music is a bot for slack which creates a playlist of songs shared in slack channel. The bot has a featured names "Sangai Sunam" that plays the shared shongs in sync with each other. It is currently hosted on Heroku.
